subject: Create goal_stack.ts session state module
description:
Create `hooks/src/session/goal_stack.ts` with:
- GoalLevel and SessionGoalStack interfaces
- getSessionId() - resolve from input/env/ppid
- loadGoalStack() / saveGoalStack() - persist to ~/.claude/sessions/{id}/
- pushGoal() / popGoal() - stack operations
- formatGoalHierarchy() - hierarchical display
- hasGlobalOverride() - check active-goal.json
